title: Stonestreet Studios Presents "Fountain & Never": Peter Pan Re-Imagined On The Streets Of L.A. For A New Web Series
text:
Stonestreet Studios
.@stone_street studios present "Fountain & Never" #webseries. Peter Pan re-imagined on the streets of L.A. #indiefilms, #TVpilots http://bit.ly/1LmcwBk
NEW YORK , Oct. 22, Stonestreet Studios ( www.stonestreet.net ) co-founders/owners, Alyssa R. Bennett and Gary O. Bennett , today announced the up-coming release of Fountain & Never , an original short-form web series written and directed by Antonio Macia and produced by Stonestreet Studios.
Fountain & Never ( http://on.fb.me/1MGQUCR ) re-imagines JM Barrie's Peter Pan as an urban street tale and follows the lives of six foster kids who have aged out of the system, left to struggle on the unforgiving streets of Los Angeles .
The first nine episodes of Fountain & Never will have its premiere screening for an invited audience on November 10 th in New York City at Stonestreet Studios.
Director/Writer Antonio Macia ( Holy Rollers, Affluenza, Anne B. Real ) filmed Fountain & Never over the span of 14 days using natural light and explored the gritty realism of inner city Los Angeles locations.
"In creating Fountain & Never, I wanted to highlight the challenge kids in the foster care children face as they age out of the system. Many of them turn 18 and are forced to face the world alone. They are ill-equipped to survive," said Mr. Macia.
Macia is an alumnus of the Stonestreet Studios Conservatory for Screen Acting & Production associated with New York University . He looked to current Stonestreet Studios' actors to find his 'Peter Pan' cast of lost boys and girls.
" Antonio Macia has molded an amazing ensemble of millennial actors whose performances linger long after each episode concludes," said co-producer Gary O. Bennett ."
Macia explained he was drawn to a short-form web series because, "It allows me as a storyteller to condense and heighten the drama, yet still create fully formed characters and plot lines."
Film and TV industry professionals interested in attending the November 10 th premiere should contact Stonestreet Studios via admin@stonestreet.net or ( 212) 229-0020.
View the trailer here - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qd6gjf0RaW0&feature=youtu.be
ABOUT Stonestreet Studios
Stonestreet Studios ( www.stonestreet.net ) is celebrating 24 years as a New York City based, fully operative, multi-purpose, visual production studio, founded by wife and husband, award-winning producer, writer and director team Alyssa Rallo Bennett and Gary O. Bennett . The studios are home to Stonestreet Productions, an independent film production company creating feature films, TV pilots, web series and short form content, and the Stonestreet Conservatory , the exclusive screen acting and production program of the New York University Tisch School of the Arts Drama Department. Stonestreet films explore the passions, eccentricities, politics and humor of character driven, no holds barred stories that seek to entertain and enlighten. The conservatory trains actors, writers and directors in the art of screen acting and filmmaking within the professional environment of an independent film studio, empowering them to become producers of their own work and careers.
